text: The Queen of Spades () is a 1910 Russian silent drama movie directed by Pyotr Chardynin.В городах России пройдут памятные мероприятия в день смерти ПушкинаПИКОВАЯ ДАМА (1910) It stars Pavel Biryukov, Aleksandra Goncharova, and Antonina Pozharskaya. The movie is based on the 1834 short story "The Queen of Spades" by Alexander Pushkin. == Actors == * Pavel Biryukov as Germann (as P. Biryukov) * Aleksandra Goncharova as Liza * Antonina Pozharskaya as Countess (as A. Pozharskaya) * Andrey Gromov as Tomskiy == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1910 movies Category:Movies directed by Pyotr Chardynin
title: The Queen of Spades (1910 movie)
